p36, Pushing Git RStudio Repository to GitHub       10.6.14
---------------------------------------------

In RStudio choose file -> new Project then Crate profject from Version Control repository.

Choose git repository and enter the SSH url for the repository on Git Hub.

This should copy the repository into a new folder in RStudio.

To push changes, use tools -> version control -> commit, and then 'push'.

Git config file must use the SSH format e.g. git@github.com:jamesmungall/Getting-and-Cleanin-Data.git

Git config file is in hidden .git folder of project directory.
